title: Arcane Comet Bug
body:
I keep having the same bug with Arcane Comet over and over again.

I select my Arcane comet Rune Page when I play Annie Mid, but whenever I get into game it switches to Phase Rush.

This is NOT me miss-clicking the rune. I thought that was the case for the first game, so I specifically made sure that I had Comet selected after that (double and triple checked!). It even showed Comet in Champ Select. But then, as soon as I get into game, I get Phase Rush.

Please help. Thanks.

replies.body:
I would recommend posting over in the Report a Bug board if it's consistent: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

It also wouldn't hurt to run a client repair, if only to rule some things out.
